dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: googletest
dependencies.description: Google test framework for C++. Also called gtest.

dependent_to.name: c-blosc2
dependent_to.description:
Next generation c-blosc with a new API, a new container and other bells
and whistles

dependent_to.name: rocksdb
dependent_to.description: RocksDB: A Persistent Key-Value Store for Flash and RAM Storage

dependent_to.name: wiredtiger
dependent_to.description:
WiredTiger is an high performance, scalable, production quality, NoSQL,
Open Source extensible platform for data management.

dependent_to.name: mongo-c-driver
dependent_to.description: libmongoc is a client library written in C for MongoDB.

dependent_to.name: leveldb
dependent_to.description:
LevelDB is a fast key-value storage library written at Google that
provides an ordered mapping from string keys to string values.

dependent_to.name: goshimmer
dependent_to.description:
GoShimmer is a prototype node for exploring the implementation of IOTA
2.0

dependent_to.name: c-blosc
dependent_to.description: Blosc, an extremely fast, multi-threaded, meta-compressor library

dependent_to.name: arrow
dependent_to.description:
A cross-language development platform for in-memory data. This package
contains the C++ bindings.

dependent_to.name: ffmpeg
dependent_to.description:
FFmpeg is a complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and
stream audio and video.

dependent_to.name: eckit
dependent_to.description:
ecKit is a cross-platform c++ toolkit that supports development of tools
and applications at ECMWF.

dependent_to.name: orc
dependent_to.description: the smallest, fastest columnar storage for Hadoop workloads.
